articles.content: Oppo Reno 7 Pro is finally getting the Android 12 update! Back in February 2022, Oppo announced the Reno 7 5G and Reno 7 Pro 5G as its flagship offerings for the Indian market. The Reno 7 Pro debuted… [+1885 chars]
